query: SELECT o.hn AS hn, o.vn AS vn, o.nextdate AS appointment_date, o.nexttime AS appointment_start, o.nexttime_end AS appointment_end, o.app_cause AS cause, o.clinic AS sub_department, o.note AS note FROM oapp AS o JOIN ovst ov ON ov.hn = o.hn WHERE o.vstdate = #date GROUP BY o.oapp_id_guid UNION ALL SELECT o.hn AS hn, o.vn AS vn, o.nextdate AS appointment_date, o.nexttime AS appointment_start, o.nexttime_end AS appointment_end, o.app_cause AS cause, o.clinic AS sub_department, o.note AS note FROM oapp AS o JOIN ovst ov ON ov.hn = o.hn JOIN ipt i ON i.an = ov.an WHERE TIMESTAMP ( i.dchdate, i.dchtime ) BETWEEN #startDateTime and #endDateTime GROUP BY o.oapp_id_guid
